summary: At the dawn of World War 2, a Rabbi's daughter and a disenchanted German soldier fall in love and are separated by the war. They struggle on a perilous journey to find one another.
cast: Jonathan Scarfe|Nina Dobrev|Zachary Bennett|Kim Coates|Daryl Hannah|Colm Feore|Mac Fyfe|Sebastian Pigott|Zion Forrest Lee|Lara Daans|Marco Tallarico|Lubomir Mykytiuk|Daniel Matmor|Zev Crystal|Melanie Merkosky|Miriam McDonald|Conrad Bergschneider|Stefan Crystal|Louise Reynolds|Roy Scheider|Jake Simons|Devon Bostick|John Watson|Robin Ruel|Maxwell Uretsky|Daniela Crystal|Anne Page|Brian Frank|Heidi von Palleske|Jessica Horn|Lindsey Frazier|Irek Muchalski|Nikolai Tichtchenko|Sam Hershoran|Damian Lee|Steve Raiman|Scarlett Conn|Cyrus Smith|Callayna Bajer|Cavanagh Matmor|Arcadia Kendal|Jesse Bostick|Joe Bostick|Shae Landers|Keenan Tamblyn

title: The Poet
